name: Inimesed
body:
**Inimesed** is a simple app that lets you search and pick a contact from your address book.
The focus of **Inimesed** is solely on search, making the contact picking action as fast and hands-free as possible. To that end the app employs search-by-voice.
tagline: Android app that lets you search your contacts by voice. Internet not required. Based on PocketSphinx. Uses Estonian acoustic models.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
